changelog: End-to-end licensing flow put in place: local licence storage, activation/refresh against the server, GUI management dialog, and recent async/timeouts so the UI stays responsive even when offline.

Project profiles became first-class: seeded into user documents, optional tracking updates, TOML-driven validation/test configuration, per-profile rename script preferences, and customizable model sort ordering for the AP renamer.

Workflow stability and UX polish: safer .esx handling, corruption-resistant app state/settings, silent update checks that fail gracefully, welcome/version messaging, and a cleaner activity console/menu layout.
Reporting & automation tooling expanded: AP list/BOM export improvements, post-deployment survey project builder, map creation scripts, and most recently a “process automation” script bundle.
Platform and packaging tweaks: paths now respect platformdirs, user assets live under Documents, bundle identifiers/app names adjusted, and outdated update/licensing code paths retired.
General hygiene: unused code and imports removed, directory moves completed, and repeated refactors to keep the codebase organised for the next round of testers.

comment: FUNDAMENTAL FUNCTIONALITY addressed, restoring bundled app version to 'usable'
